SELECT b.company_s_name, b.platform_service_provider, b.company_contract, b.payment_inventory, b.task_id, b.acceptance_certificate, b.many_payment, b.payment_date, a.real_money FROM tb_payment_inventory a JOIN tb_payment_order_many b ON a.payment_order_id = b.id WHERE YEAR(b.payment_date) = #{year} AND MONTH(b.payment_date) = #{month}
SELECT COUNT(1) as 'order_count', SUM(a.real_money) as 'bill_money' FROM tb_payment_inventory a JOIN tb_payment_order_many b ON a.payment_order_id = b.id WHERE YEAR(b.payment_date) = #{year}

SELECT pom.id, pom.platform_service_provider AS 'tax_name', pom.company_contract, pom.payment_inventory, pom.task_id, pom.acceptance_certificate, pom.payment_order_status, pom.payment_mode, pom.real_money, pom.create_date, ci.company_name, ci.bank_name AS 'payment_bank_name', ci.bank_code AS 'payment_bank_code', tp.payee, tp.bank_name AS 'payee_bank_name', tp.bank_code AS 'payee_bank_code' FROM tb_payment_order_many pom LEFT JOIN tb_tax_package tp ON pom.tax_id = tp.tax_id AND tp.package_status = 1 LEFT JOIN tb_company_info ci ON pom.company_id = ci.id WHERE pom.id = #{paymentOrderId}
